citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:25p on
16-Jul-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility and spoke with a worker. The worker stated that the licensee was not available.
The inspector left a business card with the worker.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:25p on
16-Jul-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility and spoke with a worker.  The worker stated that the licensee was not available. 
The inspector left a business card with the worker.
